title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the NanoFactoryController system, including the types of molecular manufacturing processes to be controlled, the desired level of precision, and any other relevant constraints or specifications.

title: Develop Control Algorithms
description: Develop the algorithms and logic for controlling the molecular manufacturing processes with the required precision and accuracy.

title: Design Revised User Interface for NanoFactoryController System (Revision 1)
description: This RFC proposes a revised design for the user interface of the NanoFactoryController system. The UI will be intuitive, responsive, and adhere to best practices for user experience (UX) design. It will cater to different user roles (Admin, Operator, Scientist) and access levels, seamlessly integrate with other system components, provide monitoring and control capabilities for molecular manufacturing processes, offer real-time feedback mechanisms, data visualization tools, error handling features, clear documentation, and a flexible design to accommodate future updates and expansions of the system. The UI design will be updated based on feedback received during the first iteration. This RFC serves as an update to the previous design version.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures for NanoFactoryController System
description: Design and implement robust security measures for the NanoFactoryController system. This includes implementing access controls, data encryption, secure communication protocols, threat detection mechanisms, and user authentication, authorization, and accountability features. Collaborate with relevant team members throughout the implementation process, ensuring adherence to industry best practices and standards. Document the implemented security measures in the system's technical documentation and provide regular updates on progress and any potential challenges during the implementation process.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Set up the development and testing environment for the NanoFactoryController system, including the necessary hardware, software, and tools.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing Framework (Revised)
description: Develop a robust testing framework for the NanoFactoryController system. The revised framework will include unit tests, integration tests, and system tests focusing on edge cases, error handling, performance optimizations, and security aspects. Ensure test coverage of all critical functionalities while considering best practices in test-driven development (TDD). Update the test framework to allow for easy maintenance, scalability, and extensibility. Incorporate a focus on test automation, continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) practices, and utilize techniques such as mocking, stubbing, and benchmarking. To further improve the quality and reliability of the testing framework, ensure compatibility with popular testing libraries, follow modern testing methodologies, and provide thorough documentation for future reference. Additionally, involve the QA tester team in the development process to validate the tests and provide feedback. If necessary, collaborate with other specialists (security-specialist, database-specialist) to address specific concerns such as security vulnerabilities or complex data operations.
dependencies: Set up Development and Testing Environment

title: Implement System Components
description: Implement the various components of the NanoFactoryController system, including the control algorithms, user interface, and security measures.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Conduct thorough testing of the NanoFactoryController system, using the developed testing framework, to ensure its proper functioning and compliance with the requirements.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the NanoFactoryController system, including user manuals, technical specifications, and maintenance guides.

title: Deploy and Maintain System
description: Deploy the NanoFactoryController system in the production environment, and establish processes for ongoing maintenance, updates, and support.
